knimeNode.name: Read VCF
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads one or more VCF File

fullDescription.intro: Reads one or more VCF File associated to a sample name. It takes as an input a table containing a SAMPLE name and a full file path/URL to a VCF file (possibly gzipped). It currently only supports one sample per VCF.
fullDescription.option: Ignore VCF data with a quality lower than this value

ports.inPort: The file descriptor. A file containing two columns (tab delimited). The first column contains a sample name and the second column is the absolute path to a VCF file (which can be g-zipped if needed)
ports.outPort: VCF data and the sample name
